about_the_game:
The World Has Been Infected By Dark Forces...
Since the Very Beginning they Were Here...
Throughout history they Have Been Reported...

But now, your time has come! You are called to withstand and overcome the enemy! With nothing more than a plain old board...


Cosmic Breakout is a clone of the classic game breakout: You control the board at the bottom of the screen and have to bounce off the ball to prevent losing a level and destroy the enemy-blocks at the same time. Unlike traditional breakout levels, the levels in this game consist of polygons. The precise collision mechanics lead to often unpredictable and always intense gameplay.

Be aware that this is a casual and short experience.

Features


  • Classic breakout mechanics
  • Low-poly art style
  • Piece-by-piece destructible enemies
  • 5 intense levels
  • Great soundtracks

short_description: In this breakout-inspired game you engage in a hefty arcade battle: Move with your little board against the dark polygon-forces of the world.
